itemDescription: Emeritus Professor of Reproductive Sciences in the Department of Physiology, Development and Neuroscience (PDN) at the University of Cambridge

wikipedia_page.main: Martin Hume Johnson (born 1944)  is emeritus professor of Reproductive Sciences in the Department of Physiology, Development and Neuroscience (PDN) at the University of Cambridge.

response: *  1944   – Martin Hume Johnson, English physiologist and academic
* Martin Hume Johnson, Professor of Reproductive Sciences from 1992-2012 at the University of Cambridge (Christ's College)
*Martin Hume Johnson (born 1944), Emeritus Professor of Reproductive Sciences at the University of Cambridge.
